ygData.subject: {EqBards} Fun little story
ygData.msgSnippet: So today our hero find himself in Wakening Lands, trying to get Ice Forged Shackles for himself and a friend.  After 4 hours and 1 (of the 4 we need) items
ygData.messageBody:
So today our hero find himself in Wakening Lands, trying to get Ice Forged Shackles for himself and a friend. After 4 hours and 1 (of the 4 we need) items dropping, we decide to call it a night.
Feeling enboldened by a mostly green/not seeing invis zone, our hero decides to wander for a bit...

Hmm, whats this strange tower in the middle of a pond... The inhabitants seem friendly enough, lets see what I can see from the top...

Strange looking tree up here, what is it?

Loading Please Wait...

(uh oh!)

You have entered The Plane of Growth.

/gu Umm how would a non gater get out of POG? Hypothetically speaking of course...

"Get a trans, Elf. Dumbass... :)"

/ooc Quite foolish and really embarrased bard looking for a Trans or Gate, will manasong/pay, whatever...

"Heh, you are one lucky SOB, go to n2500 n700, loot the mobs then we will trans you out"

:-)
So a POG raid with no bard was going on, and Melodic Vambraces dropped! Talk about a cool way to end the night...

Elfson Allegro 54 Veeshan


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
